name: Navigation
description: Manual accessibility checklist for navigation components (links, tabs, breadcrumbs, pagination)

items.description: Link purpose is clear from link text or context
items.procedure: Review each link and verify the link text describes the destination or purpose
items.expectedOutcome: Link text is descriptive, not generic like 'click here' or 'read more'

items.description: Links that open in new window indicate this behavior
items.procedure: Check links with target='_blank' have visual indicator and aria-label mentioning 'opens in new tab'
items.expectedOutcome: Users are informed before activating that link opens new window

items.description: Tab list has correct ARIA roles
items.procedure: Verify tablist has role='tablist', tabs have role='tab', and panels have role='tabpanel'
items.expectedOutcome: Screen reader announces tab structure correctly

items.description: Tabs are navigable with arrow keys
items.procedure: Focus on tabs and use left/right arrows to navigate between tabs
items.expectedOutcome: Arrow keys move between tabs, Enter/Space activates the tab

items.procedure: Inspect active tab and verify aria-selected attribute
items.expectedOutcome: Only the active tab has aria-selected='true', others have 'false'

items.description: Tab panel is linked to tab via aria-controls and aria-labelledby
items.procedure: Verify tab has aria-controls pointing to panel ID, panel has aria-labelledby pointing to tab ID
items.expectedOutcome: Tab and panel are programmatically associated

items.procedure: Verify last breadcrumb item has aria-current='page'
items.expectedOutcome: Screen reader announces current location in breadcrumb trail

items.description: Breadcrumb uses nav landmark with aria-label
items.procedure: Verify breadcrumb is wrapped in <nav> with aria-label='Breadcrumb'
items.expectedOutcome: Screen reader identifies breadcrumb as navigation region

items.description: Skip link is provided for repeated content
items.procedure: Verify page has 'Skip to main content' link that is visible on focus
items.expectedOutcome: Keyboard users can bypass repeated navigation

items.procedure: Verify current page in pagination has aria-current='page'
items.expectedOutcome: Screen reader announces which page is currently active
